title: Nikolas
content:
The second offering from an old print designer just beginning to dabble in type design. Your thoughts?   
 ![nikolas](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012053305im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/1985.gif)
author: walkman

comments.content:
Some of the capitals could be a bit further developed, a few simply look like enlarged versions of their lowercase counterparts.   
   
The decayed version has some nice characteristics at display sizes.
